(Simplified: 闳)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 厷 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 厷 [ gōng ] forearm, upper arm; round
①巷門。
②宏大：閎大廣博。閎言崇議(指議論宏遠)。
③姓氏。
閎中肆外 [ hóng zhōng sì wài ]: rich in substance and graceful in style (idiom)

閎字的基本解释

閎
hóng
见“闳”。

閎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户萌切，平耕，匣。］
“闳1”的繁体字。
(1)巷门。亦泛指门。
(2)大；宏大。
(3)宽广；恢宏。
(4)通“泓”。水深。泛指深远。
(5)姓。殷周之际有閎夭。见《书·君奭》。

閎字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閎； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1331第15
【唐韻】戸萌切【集韻】乎萌切【韻會】乎盲切【正韻】胡盲切，?音宏。【說文】巷門也。从門，厷，意兼聲。【爾雅·釋宮】衖門謂之閎。【註】閎，鬨頭門。【左傳·成十七年】乗輦而入干閎。【註】巷門。又【襄三十一年】高其閈閎。【註】閎，門也。又【昭二十年】使華齊御公孟，宗魯驂乗，及閎中。【註】閎，曲門中。　又天門也。【前漢·揚雄傳】騰九閎。【註】九閎，九天之門。　又【廣韻】門辟旁長橛。【爾雅·釋宮】所以止扉，謂之閎。【註】閎，長杙，卽門橜也。又【左傳·襄三十一年·閈閎釋文】又云：所以止扉，謂之閎。　又【廣韻】姓也。【書·君奭】有若閎夭。【傳】閎氏，文王弟。　又人名。【史記·歷書】落下閎運算轉歷。【註】姚氏按益都耆舊傳，閎字長公，明曉天文，隱于落下。　又【集韻】呼宏切，音訇。閎廓，深遠也。　又中寬曰閎。【禮·月令】其器圜以閎。【註】閎，讀如紘。紘謂中寬，象土含物。【韓愈·進學解】閎其中，肆其外。　又虛廓也。【莊子·知北遊】彷徨乎馮閎，大知人焉，而不知其所窮。

Basic explanation of words
Hong
hóng

Hong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guang Yun" Hu Meng cut, flat farming, box. ]
Traditional characters for "闳1".
(1) Lane gate. Also refers to the door in general.
(2) Big; grand.
(3) Broad; magnificent.
(4) Through "Hong". Water depth. Refers to far-reaching.
(5) Last name. There was Hongyao during the Yin and Zhou Dynasties. See "Book · Jun Xi".
Hong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Door Character Department] 　闳; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1331 to 15
[Tang Yun] 戸 Meng cut [Ji Yun] Almost Meng cut [Rhyme] Almost blind cut [Zheng Yun] Hu blind cut,? Yinhong. [Said the text] The lane gate is also. From the door, wailing, both meaning and sound. [Erya·Shigong] Yamen is called Zhihong. [Note] Hong, coax the head door. [Zuo Zhuan·Seventeen years of adulthood] Riding in a few minutes to enter Qianhong. [Note] Lane gate. Also [Thirty-one Years of Xiang Xiang] Gao Qihuan. [Note] Hong, Men Ye. Also [20th year of Zhao] made Huaqi Yugongmeng, Zonglu Chengcheng, and Hongzhong. [Note] Hong, Qumenzhong.　Heavenly gate again. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Teng Jiuhong. [Note] Jiuhong, the gate of nine days.　[Guangyun] A long prong beside the door. 【Erya·Shigong】So stop is called Zhihong. [Note] Hong, Changyu, Yumenyu also. Also [Zuo Zhuan·Thirty-one Years of Xiang Xiang·Huan Hong Shi Wen】and said: So stop Fei, it is called Zhi Hong.　[Guangyun] The last name is also. 【Book·Junxin】There is Ruo Hongyao. [Biography] Hong's, Wen Wang's brother.　Another name. 【Historical Records·Almanac】Luoxiahong calculates the calendar. [Note] According to the old biography of Yidu Qi, Yao's name is Long Gong, Ming Xiao Tian, hidden in the fall.　[Jiyun] Hu Hongqie, Yinxun. Hongkuo is far-reaching.　Yang Zhongkuan said Hong. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】The device is surrounded by Hong. [Note] Hong, read as Ruhong. Hong is said to be medium wide, like soil containing objects. [Han Yu·Jinxue Jie] Hong, among them, is beyond.　It's also imaginary. [Zhuangzi·Knowing the North Tour] Hesitating about Feng Hong, knowing people well, but not knowing where he is poor.
